feed.subtitle: I am passionate about coding,and mad about learning new tech things.Will try to share my Problem Solving Skills along with high level and low level design concepts in the form of series of blogs, in which i will try to explain optimal solution to real time problems and interesting Algorithm and Data Structure Questions which are frequently asked in tech gaints.
